metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27840 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in samba. Spaces used in a string around a domain name (DN), while supposed to be ignored, can cause invalid DN strings with spaces to instead write a zero-byte into out-of-bounds memory, resulting in a crash. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This issue is actually in the ldb package, the samba package uses the system ldb library, not the included one

criterions.comment: ldb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
